entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening and after midnight. Flurries beginning after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
